```{r bib, cache=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, 
           bib.style = "authoryear", 
           style = "markdown",
           max.names = 5,
           dashed = TRUE,
           no.print.fields = 
             c("url", "page","isbn", "location", "urldate", "note", "urldate", "issn")
           )
bib_file <- "bib.bib"
bib <- ReadBib(bib_file)
```
